description: Gets a report download link for a successful Device Advisor qualifying test suite run. Requires permission to access the GetSuiteRunReport action.

parameters.name: suiteDefinitionId
parameters.description: Suite definition ID of the test suite.

parameters.name: suiteRunId
parameters.description: Suite run ID of the test suite run.

nested_items.name: qualificationReportDownloadUrl
nested_items.description: Download URL of the qualification report.
